channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28323|2024-08-02T12:38:24.901Z -- ivanti -- ivanti%20endpoint%20manager
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data exists in EPM 2022 Su3 and all prior versions that allows an unauthenticated user to elevate rights. This exploit could potentially be used in conjunction with other OS (Operating System) vulnerabilities to escalate privileges on the machine or be used as a stepping stone to get to other network attached machines.

item.title: CVE-2023-28324|2024-08-02T12:38:24.970Z -- ivanti -- ivanti%20endpoint%20manager
item.description: A improper input validation vulnerability exists in Ivanti Endpoint Manager 2022 and below that could allow privilege escalation or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-28129|2024-08-02T12:30:24.334Z -- ivanti -- desktop%20%26%20server%20management%20%28dsm%29
item.description: DSM 2022.2 SU2 and all prior versions allows a local low privileged account to execute arbitrary OS commands as the DSM software installation user.

item.title: CVE-2024-29823|2024-08-02T01:17:57.385Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29828|2024-08-02T01:17:57.504Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-27978|2024-08-02T00:41:56.001Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an authenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-29826|2024-08-02T01:17:58.045Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29205|2024-08-02T01:10:54.619Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: An Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in the web component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to send specially crafted requests in-order-to cause service disruptions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29848|2024-08-02T01:17:57.361Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.x allows an authenticated, privileged user to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-29825|2024-08-02T01:17:57.543Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29824|2024-08-02T01:17:57.983Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29822|2024-08-02T01:17:58.027Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-27984|2024-08-02T00:41:55.988Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete specific type of files and/or cause denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-29827|2024-08-02T01:17:57.542Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-27977|2024-08-02T00:41:55.951Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete arbitrary files, thereby leading to Denial-of-Service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27976|2024-08-02T00:41:55.940Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-29829|2024-08-02T01:17:58.030Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29204|2024-08-02T01:10:55.201Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-29846|2024-08-02T01:17:58.190Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: An Use-after-free vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2024 flat allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22052|2024-07-23T18:32:06.597Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack

item.title: CVE-2024-24998|2024-07-23T18:34:00.596Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-29824|2024-07-09T12:52:54.614Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-23527|2024-06-20T15:27:26.822Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-38042|2024-05-31T17:38:31.427Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Windows allows a low privileged user to execute code as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2023-38551|2024-06-04T17:28:21.734Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A CRLF Injection vulnerability in Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows an authenticated high-privileged user to inject malicious code on a victimâ€™s browser, thereby leading to cross-site scripting attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-46807|2024-06-04T17:22:20.190Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in web component of EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.title: CVE-2023-46810|2024-05-31T17:38:31.425Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20linux
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Linux before 22.7R1, allows a low privileged user to execute code as root.

item.title: CVE-2023-46806|2024-06-04T17:22:17.015Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in a web component of EPMM versions before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.title: CVE-2023-46808|2024-03-31T01:45:43.264Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An file upload vulnerability in Ivanti ITSM before 2023.4, allows an authenticated remote user to perform file writes to the server. Successful exploitation may lead to execution of commands in the context of non-root user.

item.title: CVE-2023-41724|2024-03-31T01:45:42.684Z -- ivanti -- sentry
item.description: A command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Sentry prior to 9.19.0 allows unauthenticated threat actor to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance within the same physical or logical network.

item.title: CVE-2024-29204|2024-06-04T17:58:19.523Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22059|2024-06-04T17:52:57.179Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote authenticated user to read/modify/delete information in the underlying database. This may also lead to DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-22023|2024-06-10T17:51:01.005Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: An XML entity expansion or XEE vulnerability in SAML component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated attacker to send specially crafted XML requests in-order-to temporarily cause resource exhaustion thereby resulting in a limited-time DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-22058|2024-06-07T16:27:04.757Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: A buffer overflow allows a low privilege user on the local machine that has the EPM Agent installed to execute arbitrary code with elevated permissions in Ivanti EPM 2021.1 and older.

item.title: CVE-2024-22053|2024-04-04T19:45:10.175Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A heap overflow vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack or in certain conditions read contents from memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-22024|2024-02-13T04:07:04.355Z -- ivanti -- ics
item.description: An XML external entity or XXE vulnerability in the SAML component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x), Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) and ZTA gateways which allows an attacker to access certain restricted resources without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-22052|2024-04-04T19:45:10.169Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack

item.title: CVE-2024-22026|2024-05-22T22:55:11.219Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-22061|2024-06-04T17:52:32.847Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-22060|2024-05-31T17:38:31.402Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote, authenticated, high privileged user to write arbitrary files into sensitive directories of ITSM server.

item.title: CVE-2024-27975|2024-06-04T17:47:33.712Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An Use-after-free vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-27978|2024-06-04T17:47:22.296Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an authenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks.

item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete specific type of files and/or cause denial of service.

item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete arbitrary files, thereby leading to Denial-of-Service.

item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.description: An Integer Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks. In certain rare conditions this could also lead to reading content from memory.

item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-22023|2024-08-01T22:35:34.713Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: An XML entity expansion or XEE vulnerability in SAML component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated attacker to send specially crafted XML requests in-order-to temporarily cause resource exhaustion thereby resulting in a limited-time DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-22053|2024-08-01T22:35:34.816Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A heap overflow vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack or in certain conditions read contents from memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-22061|2024-08-01T22:35:34.718Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-22058|2024-08-01T22:35:34.747Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: A buffer overflow allows a low privilege user on the local machine that has the EPM Agent installed to execute arbitrary code with elevated permissions in Ivanti EPM 2021.1 and older.

item.title: CVE-2024-21894|2024-08-01T22:35:33.424Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A heap overflow vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack. In certain conditions this may lead to execution of arbitrary code

item.title: CVE-2024-22052|2024-08-01T22:35:34.818Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack

item.title: CVE-2024-22060|2024-08-01T22:35:34.702Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote, authenticated, high privileged user to write arbitrary files into sensitive directories of ITSM server.

item.title: CVE-2024-22024|2024-08-01T22:35:34.846Z -- ivanti -- ics
item.description: An XML external entity or XXE vulnerability in the SAML component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x), Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) and ZTA gateways which allows an attacker to access certain restricted resources without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-37381|2024-08-02T03:50:55.937Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2024 flat allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.
